channel.title: Robox release RSS feed
channel.description: This RSS feed is about Robox releases

item.title: Fri3d Camp f1.0.1/v1.0.1
item.description: First release for the speakers built at Fri3d Camp.

item.title: Fri3d Camp f1.0.2/v1.0.2
item.description: An update for the speakers. Allows adding, removing and editing of the web players radio station URL's. Can also check for new software releases and notify the user.
